title: Fps drop since last patch

replies.body: It sounds like that drop in fps might be happening as time goes on due to more and more game assets being used. It could be that your pc is having a hard time handling everything at once, or there might be some driver that missed an update and now it can't keep up. Try going over the points in this [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) to see if we can narrow down what's slowing down those frames.
Hey, I have the same problem. My laptop is new with GTX 960. Hope someone can fix the problem
